title: General Analysis Launches: Finding Failure Modes for AI Models
snippet: Founded by Rez Havaei ‍ ‍ Challenge. As AI systems become increasingly capable, their deployment in high-stakes environments poses significant risks—financial, ethical, and otherwise—where errors can lead to substantial consequences.
